Instruction: In a separate bowl, beat the egg whites until they form stiff peaks. Gently fold the beaten egg whites into the batter until just combined.

In another large glass or metal mixing bowl, beat the egg whites until they become foamy and soft peaks emerge. When lifting your beater or whisk straight up, the egg whites will create soft mounds instead of a pointed peak. Gently fold the egg whites into the prepared batter.

Set an aebleskiver pan over medium heat and coat each cup with cooking spray. Fill each cup with batter until it's about 2/3 full. Cook until golden brown on both sides, flipping with a toothpick, which takes about 1 to 2 minutes per side.
